Posts.Content: HI to all, my father 64 years old Gleason 9, mets on bone, liver and lungs. He has failed: casodex+decapetyl, taxotere, jevtana. Now he not have chance, because in Italy is not possible have zytiga or mdv3100. Any idea when I can buy this pharma? Many thx to all
Posts.Title: Need zytiga funding
